name: Sweat and Tears for Blood - STB
name_original: Sweat and Tears for Blood - STB
description:
STB is a tactical and strategic game based on the principles of "Easy to learn - Hard to master".  

The player takes on the role of the leader of the Polish army, and his task is to defeat the army of opponents. The AI will fight you as well as each other. The game offers a large map, special skills to discover and very pleasant music that suits the game. To defeat all opponents you will need at least a few approaches to the game. Game time = 10 - 60 min. depends on leadership and tactical skills. The game has 4 main data, one is the number of movement points, the second shows the number of the turn, the third shows the amount of money and the fourth shows the power and strength of the player.

Helpfull: 

1. The greater the player's power is, the more likely a penalty will be imposed on the player, or a bonus for the opponent.  

2. To turn the music up or down just press up or down arrows. 

3. To discover new technologies click "tab", you can unlock them by money: 

More mp - give more move points - cost 40 

heal you unit - it will rise you unit if it's destroyed - cost 150 

money - give you 10 more money per turn - cost 150 

decrease - decrease by 1 enemy's attack - 100 

increase attack - increase you attack by 1 - cost 80 

increase hp - increase armor of your units by 1 - cost 120

4. After shooting to enemy you will get +50 gold. 

5. Enemy after shooting will get +1 point to their damage dealing.
